- make form_object convert input names like "x.y" convert into an actual nested object

- have an array of all strings (eg. "( 'x' 'y' 'z' )") turn into just a concatted string ("xyz") instead of ['x','y','z']

- allow for view-script-based function definition: appl.def("submit_post path resource", "on 'submit' (post path resource)")
